con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
assert json.intentToFile.associatedBenefitClaimId == 0 assert json.intentToFile.corpParticpantId == 1 assert json.intentToFile.expirationDate > 1 assert json.intentToFile.intentToFileID == 1 assert json.intentToFile.receivedDate > 1 assert json.intentToFile.source.equals("VDC") assert json.intentToFile.status.equals("ACTIVE") assert json.intentToFile.type.equals("COMPENSATION") assert json.intentToFile.vetParticipantId == 0

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
assert json.allIntentToFiles.size > 0 for (x in 0..json.allIntentToFiles.size - 1) { assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].associatedBenefitClaimId != null assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].corpParticpantId != null assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].expirationDate > 1 assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].intentToFileID != null assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].receivedDate > 1 assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].source.equals("VDC") assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].status != null assert json.allIntentToFiles[x].type.equals("COMPENSATION") }

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
assert json.anyHistoricalClaimsConsolidatable != null
assert json.historicalClaims.size > 0 for (x in 0..json.historicalClaims.size - 1) { assert json.historicalClaims[x].appealPossible != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].attentionNeeded != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].claimCompleteDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].claimConsolidatable != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].claimPhaseDates != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].claimStatus != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].closeDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].date != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].decisionNotificationSent != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].developmentLetterSent != null
assert json.historicalClaims[x].id != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].latestEvidenceRecdDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].newEvidenceReceived != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].pastEstClaimDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].pastEvidenceDueDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].pastPhaseEstDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].pastEvidenceDueDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].pastPhaseEstDate != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].programType != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].status != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].statusChanged != null assert json.historicalClaims[x].waiver5103Submitted != null }
